values.title: sylvia plath
values.desc: Perhaps when we find ourselves wanting everything it is because we are dangerously close to wanting nothing

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals

values.title: Ursula K Le Guin
values.desc: It is good to have an end to journey toward but it is the journey that matters in the end

values.title: Henry David Thoreau
values.desc: If you have built castles in the air your work need not be lost

values.title: Suzanne Collins
values.desc: Aim higher in case you fall short

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: If you want to live a happy life tie it to a goal not to people or things

values.title: Eleanor Roosevelt
values.desc: Happiness is not a goalits a byproduct of a life well lived

values.title: Coco Chanel
values.desc: If you were born without wings do nothing to prevent them from growing

values.title: Marilyn Monroe
values.desc: Dreaming about being an actress is more exciting then being one

values.title: Laini Taylor
values.desc: It was impossible of course But when did that ever stop any dreamer from dreaming

values.title: Dr Roopleen
values.desc: If you have a dream dont just sit there Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality

values.title: Bruce Lee
values.desc: A goal is not always meant to be reached it often serves simply as something to aim at

values.title: Seneca the Younger
values.desc: If a man knows not to which port he sails no wind is favorable

values.title: Karen Lamb
values.desc: A year from now you may wish you had started today

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Dream your own dreams achieve your own goals Your journey is your own and unique

values.title: Yogi Berra
values.desc:
If you dont know where you are going
youll end up someplace else
